creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: The Education of the Young King, wool, silk, French XVIc a piece form the tapestry cycle woven for Marie de' Medici, The Stories of Queen Artemisia, based on an epic account by Nicolas Houel; woven in the Faubourg Saint-Marcel Manufactory of Marc de Comaus and Frauçois de la Planche; warp undyed wool, 6-7 ends per cm., weft dyed wool and silk, 24-40 eds per cm.
title: The Education of the Young King
